review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2021
name: samuel
title: Melted in transit
review: Banana bites arrived as a large, flat banana soaked in chocolate.We had to freeze it before cutting into it with a chef knife.Good flavor, not so good execution

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2021
name: Mary swanger
title: Nasty tasting
review: This definitely did not meet expectations for my autistic grandson taste buds. It was nasty, both the taste and the smell. Definitely not intended for sensory deprived children.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2021
name: Unknown
title: GROSS
review: I love this product, Amazon has made some sort of error while handling this product. The chocolate is meant to be smooth. The product I received it dry and crumbly. I decided to eat one and see if it at least tasted good. It did not. Buy this snack somewhere else.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2021
name: Tina Coleman
title: The item came melted and i was not able to enjoy it . i was told they will not replace it or refund
review: Its just a blob of meltedchocolate. not worth your money.i just put it in the trash.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2021
name: K
title: Defective shipment?
review: Not sure if I just received a bad batch or what. I usually buy these in the store and have bought on Amazon before as well. But every bag in this shipment contains tiny little crumbs of banana bites rather than the normal bite size ones. It makes them annoying to eat as a snack (but would probably be ok as a topping to something). Haven‚Äôt had this problem before but this box is a waste of $$ for me.

title: Its not what i thought. The banana üçå and chocolate not sweet.
review: It was not sweet enough to my liking. The texture was rubbery like diet snacks.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2021
name: Daniellleee
title: Not very good, smells off
review: These said they are good until later November of this year but when I opened the bag it made me want to gag. I even asked my husband for a 2nd opinion because I was scared to try them and he said the stunk, taste off and not to give to our toddler. So I had to throw a brand new pack away :(

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2021
name: Melanie Puckett
title: Don't order in summer
review: My order came in the bottom of the box of other items. It was melted and mushy. It's a nonrefundable item.

review: When I bought it in the store it was actually bite size. When ordered on Amazon it came all crushed. Couldn‚Äôt even eat it.

review: Don'twaste your money. It'sterrible.

review: Love these chewy bananas carried them with me to work! Hunger fighter!! Oh yeah

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2021
name: Andrew
title: I'd buy them again on sale
review: This is what one serving looks like (40g for 185 calories). I tried them because they were on sale and they were very interesting. Chewy, chocolate-peanut buttery with a slight banana taste. I'd buy them again on sale.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2021
name: LFeren
title: Delicious snack!
review: Love this candy.Banana covered with chocolate.The chocolate is like a thick raisinette chocolate. Delicious

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2021
name: LibraryRose
title: Banana LUMP (melted) - this why3 stars
review: I am sure these would have tasted great as hand little bitesif they had actually arrived intact. When we opened the bag, it was one giant squishy melted lump of goo. We stuck the entire bag in the refrigerator and are now shaving bits off with a knife.Now that they have been melted and refrigerated the temper is broke, so the taste/consistence is off as a result. This is probably a shipping problem rather than a product problem but it does make me leery of ording them again.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2021
name: Lover of Fine Products
title: Used to be great - they are no longer bites, the packages are filled with crumbles
review: I'm not sure what has happened recently with the Bites.They used to be excellent.The last 4 packages have been filled with itsy bitsey crumbles.It's extremely hard to eat them.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2021
name: Bamela Anderson
title: It's got a weird texture
review: I was expecting it to be crunchy. It all just kind of oozes together when you eat it. Can't really feel the texture or taste of banana.
